title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.14 - NFTA shuttle service-airport
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.14 - NFTA shuttle service-airport

State Regulations
(a) General system--privileges granted. The NFTA operates an airport courtesy
shuttle service on the airport roadways and grounds, for the express purpose of
providing convenient transportation for airport passengers and users between
the airport buildings, as well as to and from the airport's long-term parking
lot. This service operates free of charge to users, and in addition to the
above, may travel along the airport roadways to pick up passengers/users at
non-designated stops. Such vehicles shall pick-up and drop-off passengers and
their luggage at both terminals' designated curbside locations and at the
parking lot. (b) Fees and charges. NFTA shuttle service is exempt from fees and charges. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
